meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Liz Bass Sam Spencer Jon Groubert Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7540.

td.p: Liz Bass, a college journalism teacher from Manhasset, New York
Sam Spencer, an engineering graduate student from Champaign, Illinois
Jon Groubert, a former attorney from Denver, Colorado (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,401)

tr.td: MARCONI & CHEESE
FAMOUS WOMEN
"S" WORDS
BOOK BINDINGS
BULLET POINTS
400 SHOWS ON IN 2017
